
This example demonstrates the required metadata by [`methodshub`](https://github.com/GESIS-Methods-Hub/methodshub).

## Execution of R code

```{r}
1 + 1
```

## Execution of R code from package

```{r setup}
library(mwe)
```

```{r}
hello()
```

## Creation of figure with R

```{r}
plot(rnorm(10), rnorm(10))
```
